=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Nicole Miller 2 Pack (30 Count Each) Charcoal and Rosehip Facial Cleansing and Make Up Remover Wipes
Review Date: 2019/11/15
Store: Nicole Miller
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Nicole Miller', 'Skin Type': 'acne prone', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Count', 'Item Form': 'Wipes', 'Package Type': 'Pouch', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.77 x 4.17 x 3.54 inches; 1.11 Pounds', 'UPC': '192598163615'}
Review Text: Wasn’t a huge fan of these, they look cool but that’s about it. The wipes themselves don’t have much moisture on them so u need to use three or four of them. Plus with the cloth being black u cannot see if all your makeup is fully removed
Review Title: Would Not Recommend
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Moresoo 18inch Tape in Hair Extensions Human Hair Blonde Hair Real Human Hair 20pcs 50g Remy Human Hair Extensions Tape on Balayage #6 Brown to Blonde #60 Glue on Hair Seamless Skin Weft Hair
{'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Tape-In', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.49 x 5 x 1.89 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '711931080862'}
Love love love this company love the hair. I use a little bit of blonde shampoo to keep the color nice and bright. Love it. Ive been doing extensions for nearly 12 years and these are some of the best in this price point.
Amaaaaazing hairr omgg
Full Shine 18" Tape in Remy Human Hair Extensions Tape Ombre Extensions Dip Dyed Color #8 Ash Brown Fading to #60 and #18 Ash Blonde Highlighted Extensions 20 Pcs 50gram Per Package
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.6 x 5 x 2 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '734602042013'}
This color is very hard to find. Very blendable and soft. I would def recommend two or three packs for a full head of extensions.
Color is perfect
VeSunny 20" Remy Keratin Tip Hair Extensions Blonde Human Hair 1G/S #60 Platinum Blonde Pre Bonded Flat Tip Human Hair Extensions 50 Strands
Ve Sunny
{'Brand': 'Ve Sunny', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Fusion', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '20 x 1 x 1 inches; 4.23 Ounces', 'UPC': '798863458884'}
Love this hair. It does require some additional toning if ur looking for that icy blonde color. And requires deep conditioning but I love this hair. Great for someone looking for some added length and thickness
Love these
VeSunny 16inch #4 Dark Brown Remy Tape in Hair Extensions Human Hair 20pcs 100% Remy Tape in Hair Extensions 50g Per Pack 20pcs
Ve Sunny
{'Brand': 'Ve Sunny', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '16 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Tape-In', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '16 x 1 x 1 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '799577978088'}
Beautiful hair. Great quality. It does shed a lot but stays in well for about five to six weeks. Great for a temporary longer thicker look. Would highly recommend.
Great hair
Sunny 40pcs 100g 16inch Tape in Colored Hair Extensions Dark Brown Fade to Honey Blonde Balayage Double Weft Tape in Hair Extensions Real Human Hair
Sunny Beauty
{'Brand': 'Sunny Beauty', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Tape', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '16 x 1 x 1 inches; 3.52 Ounces', 'UPC': '639631413158'}
My clients love this hair. The downfall is that is does shed but even extensions twice as much $$ shed. They do get dry so I would recommend using a leave in conditioner on them. I do re-tape them with babe tape for extra hold. These are re.usable if properly cared for. The color is very blend-able and natural.
Love this hair.
Nicole Miller 2 Pack (30 Count Each) Charcoal and Rosehip Facial Cleansing and Make Up Remover Wipes
Nicole Miller

Wasn’t a huge fan of these, they look cool but that’s about it. The wipes themselves don’t have much moisture on them so u need to use three or four of them. Plus with the cloth being black u cannot see if all your makeup is fully removed

profile:
**User Summary Update:**

- **Hair Preference:** The user maintains a strong preference for high-quality human hair extensions, particularly in blonde hues, while also showing interest in darker shades, especially with recent purchases demonstrating versatility.

- **Experience Level:** With 12 years of experience in using hair extensions, the user is knowledgeable in various product types and installation techniques.

- **Product Type:** Prefers seamless, tape-in, and fusion extensions for their natural look. Recent acquisitions with balayage effects indicate a continued exploration of unique color combinations.

- **Recent Purchases:** Recently purchased colored extensions transitioning from dark brown to honey blonde, emphasizing a willingness to experiment with innovative styles and shades.

- **Maintenance:** The user follows specific hair care practices, using leave-in conditioners and re-taping extensions, highlighting a commitment to maintaining quality and appearance.

- **Quality Focus:** Consistently prioritizes high-quality products, appreciating their performance and blendability. Despite occasional shedding, the user is focused on durability and the ability to reuse extensions.

- **Overall Satisfaction:** The user generally provides favorable ratings for products while noting minor maintenance needs, indicating an ongoing commitment to finding extensions that balance aesthetics with functionality.

- **Skincare Interaction:** Recently explored facial cleansing products but expressed disappointment in performance, specifically regarding moisture levels and makeup removal effectiveness, suggesting a discerning approach to skincare as well.
